definition: to explode/spontaneous detonation/self-detonation/suicide bombing/to disclose private matters about oneself
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil

sentences.english: Instead, she blew herself up in Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 但她把自爆地點選在了伊拉克。

sentences.english: We must empower a Pacific Rim cordon until China'sbulwark implodes.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須授權一個泛太平洋警戒線，直到中國自爆。

sentences.english: We know that in Battle Report 2, Banelings no longer roll.
sentences.chinese: 我們知道在戰報2裏，自爆蟲不再滾着走了。

sentences.english: The place would implode within 6 months .

definition: to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
to cause to burn/to ignite/to detonate/a fuse
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
to fall down/to decay/to fall from the sky/to die
to combine/combination/composite character (i.e. a synonym of 合體字|合体字[he2 ti3 zi4])/(of clothes) to be a good fit
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
out of control/berserk/to go for a long walk
to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
